mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_date, notice_vote, notice_title, notice_content, notice_hide, viewer_count, employee_no) VALUES (#{noticeDate}, #{noticeVote}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeHide}, #{viewerCount}, #{employeeNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_date = #{noticeDate}, notice_vote = #{noticeVote}, notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_hide = #{noticeHide}, viewer_count = #{viewerCount}, employee_no = #{employeeNo} WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
